did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Recreational Facilities Study of the Tucson Area, 1951
did.abstract: Material included is a typescript study of Tucson recreational facilities. Also includes bibliographies.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Study by the members of a Playgrounds and Recreation course offered by the University of Arizona, Physical Education Dept. in 1951.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Typescript study of Tucson recreational facilities. Includes bibliographies.
